name: Loathful
description:
EPILEPSY WARNING

Step into the world of Loathful, a first-person Psychological Horror game that immerses you in a vintage, retro-style universe featuring PS1 graphics. Where, What was meant to be an escape turns into a relentless nightmare.

Main characteristics:


Step into the shoes of a young employee at 'Neural Net Solutions,' a cutting-edge technology enterprise on the forefront of innovation. They've offered you a unique opportunity to test their groundbreaking technology, allowing you to upload your mind into the cloud, whether temporarily or for eternity.

Immerse yourself in a world filled with subtle mechanics and intricate puzzles, where your primary objective is to explore an unfamiliar realm that constantly push you to your limits.

Inspired by beloved games of the same genre, 'Loathful' distinguishes itself with its retro design and straightforward yet highly effective gameplay

Features:


  • A bone-chilling experience where you are the vulnerable one, hunted by everything and everyone around you
  • Explore five distinct worlds set in a ever-changing virtual reality vacation resort
  • Encounter a variety of enemy types, each with unique mechanics to keep you on your toes
  • Immersive first-person gameplay with a retro feel
  • Solve various intricate puzzles and riddles
  • In-depth story which expands upon itself with videos and documents.
